function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Noise pollution affecting N100 million people in Europe, leading to stress, elevated blood pressure, and other health issues.","Impact":"Physiological disorders and diseases, including dementia, stroke, and heart attack, can be initiated by noise pollution.","Mitigation":"Implement noise reduction measures, create noise-free zones, and raise awareness about the health impacts of noise pollution.","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, noise barriers, and quiet technology for transportation.","People":"Residents, workers, and animals in urban environments.","Owner":"Government, urban planners, and environmental organizations."},{"Description":"Chronic traffic noise hazardous to birds, leading to embryo mortality and growth issues in zebra finches.","Impact":"Negative effects on bird populations and sensitivity to noise in other creatures, including amphibians and marine life.","Mitigation":"Implement noise reduction measures near bird habitats, conduct research on noise sensitivity in different species, and regulate transportation noise levels.","Technologies":"Acoustic monitoring systems, sound-absorbing materials in urban environments, and bird-friendly urban design.","People":"Environmental agencies, wildlife conservation organizations, and urban planners.","Owner":"Government, wildlife conservation organizations, and transportation agencies."},{"Description":"International flights almost standing still due to lockdowns, reducing noise pollution from air traffic.","Impact":"Temporary reduction in noise pollution from air traffic during lockdowns.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to regulate noise pollution from air traffic, promote alternative transportation methods, and invest in quieter aircraft technology.","Technologies":"Noise-reducing aircraft design, alternative transportation infrastructure, and air traffic management systems.","People":"Residents living near airports and flight paths.","Owner":"Airports, aviation authorities, and government bodies."}]}
